name: formulytic-fullstack

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "üñ•Ô∏è BACKEND,üåê FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run server" "npm run frontend"

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run start

description: Karnataka Social Impact Evaluation Survey - Full Stack Application
